name: SetAssemblyVersion
description: Set Assembly Version on all AssemblyInfo and SharedAssemblyInfo (optional) files.
author: ggarbuglia

inputs.name: mayornumber
inputs.label: Mayor Number
inputs.helpMarkDown: The assembly version mayor number. Leave it blank if you want to use current mayor number.

inputs.name: minornumber
inputs.label: Minor Number
inputs.helpMarkDown: The assembly version minor number. Leave it blank if you want to use current minor number.

inputs.name: buildnumber
inputs.label: Build Number
inputs.helpMarkDown: The assembly version build number. Leave it blank if you want to use current build number.

inputs.name: revisionnumber
inputs.label: Revision Number
inputs.helpMarkDown: The assembly version revision number. Leave it blank if you want to use current revision number.

inputs.name: checkforshared
inputs.label: Shared File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check if you use a SharedAssemblyInfo file in your project.
